topic.fullpath: Topic :: Internet :: WWW/HTTP :: Dynamic Content :: CGI Tools/Libraries

name: WWW-SQL
short_description: WWW-SQL is a CGI used to display information from MySQL or PostgreSQL databases in web pages, using simple commands embedded in special HTML tags. The tags are evaluated when the page is loaded.
